caption: I have been to a few Chinese Gourmets and this is by far the worst one. They were out of literally everything they served. The cook had to make more noodles to accommodate the couple who cut me off and me. I got a 2 entree dinner with noodles. The noodles tasted like straight up sesame oil and had no veg in it like its supposed to. The couple who cut me off got the very last bourben chicken and when I asked if they could make more she said "no, no it takes to long to make" and forced me to get the spicy chicken instead. The orange chicken didn't taste anything like I'm used too either. The cook threw in a couple egg rolls to make it better but when I bit into it, it was cold in the middle. It was all terrible. Hopefully I don't get food poisoning from the nasty spicy chicken and egg rolls that had been sitting in the heated pan for who knows how long. I am a fan of Chinese Gourmets food, especially for it being mall food, but this was severely disappointing. What a waste of a drive and $9.

Very good costumer service. Super friendly and nice. I am really happy with the way the employee treated me. Very delicious food. I Appreciate this business. Hope I can come back soon and enjoy their food.
PLACE IS DELICIOUS CHICKEN WAS 🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥 loved it great SERVICE

There food was very disgusting and when my sister went back to get a refund so we could go somewhere else they said no and gave us another plate and we asked for the rice to be more sauce and it was still dry
Best Chinese food I’ve ever had. Their orange chicken is amazing and this is the first time I’ve actually enjoyed eating rice. A++++

I went to eat last week the food tasted like plastic and so dry I couldn’t even eat it I had to throw it away she was being rude and even overcharged me It tasted like the food was from a day ago or it was not cooked right not going again
Threatened to call the cops on me after my card had been declined once but it showed a balance on my card. There was rude costumer service.

The Spicy Bourbon Chicken has great flavor, and that was a smart way to lend some kick to a classic chicken recipe. Only complaint is it was dry. Sauce only helps so much. Great seasoning on the green beans though. Staff are nice.
Ate there yesterday and got sick. Never again the noodles where not completely done. Shut this place down and go to PF Changs where the food is fresh
sooo disgusting. food is soft and mushy. weird flavoring taste
The food was very soggy and disgusting. I threw away after a few bites. Waste of money.
Omg so sick right now. Like 5 min after. Do not eat here

Beware this place was on T.V. for food violations over 100 roaches in the kitchen. They share the same kitchen with the Chinese restaurant next to them. I have never been and will never go. For me it's not real Chinese food

Fried rice was extremely dry and not boiled. Jalapeno chicken is worse, chicken tasted old and full of bold soy sauce and not spicy at all. I have also found a piece of paper in the dish. Couldn't take a picture.  General Tso chicken is little better. They are keeping plastic cutlery and napkins with them and give it only when you ask with limited quantity.  Please guys, make a better food for customer. We are not ordering it for free.
The portion is good and tastes okay but the noodles were dry.  They were aware of that and still served to customers.
We've eaten here twice so far and the food was good, so was the service. Prices are great. We will be visiting again.
At here with my husband today and we both got food poisoning. Will be calling health dept. and store to get my money back!!!!

I eat here all of the time. The staff is always courteous; the food is always hot, tasty, and well portioned; and the prices are great. I'm not sure if they've changed ownership since the other reviewers went here or if rudeness beget rudeness, but I've certainly never had an issue.
Their orange chicken is hard and dry.

Worst experience ever!!  Do not eat there! My food was disgusting, took one bite the food was cold and taste old!  I tried to get a refund and the manager told me No! After telling her I had just ordered it . She said I couldn't get my money back bc I'm not WHITE.   Took everything in me not to throw the food in her face!  She can keep the damn money  it's obvious she needs it more than me!
Manager cursed at me when I told her the noodles were stale
Typical mall Chinese.
Lo mein was dry. Rice was hard and bland. The entree I got could have be good had it been fresh. Will probably try the place next door next time.

I always go to the other Chinese food place at this mall (bourbon street) but I decided to try these guys out. Worst mistake ever. Food wasn't good. Rice was nasty. As well, the food gave me food poisoning. Ever since eating there, I've been having this stomach pain for the past day or so. Will NEVER GO THERE'S AGAIN.
